positive.review:
Small idle/clicker game with free loot boxes. 
The art is minimal, and more would be welcome. There are a lot of butts to collect, and it will take you some time to catch them all. You will find them in the loot boxes.

The beginning of the game is slow (there is no auto-clicker). You have to click/slap a humongus amount of times, but once the idle/auto upgrade is complete, you won't have any more upgrades (ironic). It will then become more of a collection game for butts and steam achievements.

Although there is minimal gooning, the game is nice.

I just spent the most epic afternoon of my life slapping butts with Amarillo's Butt Slapper! Who knew physics could be so... jiggly? This game is a real game-changer (or should I say, butt-changer?). The best part? It's free! I'm not sure what's more impressive, the game's daring humor or its wallet-friendly price tag. If you're looking for a unique gaming experience that will leave you giggling, look no further. Just remember, with great butt power comes great responsibility
Great game play, exactly as described. I wish more game publishers were as truthful.

I feel as if this game had changed my life, before this game, my asshole was as wide as an elephants. But after playing ABS, my asshole tightened, I started making hella money, and I have millions of monthly listeners on spotify.

Go follow me my name is Nettspend

Butts


No, really. That is it. If you are so bored you need to kill 15 minutes for some reason, just play this. Butts are nice tho

A pretty shallow game overall, offering little beyond some overly polished booty physics and the option to smack them with both hands. Thankfully, my self-control is solid, so I only messed around for about ten minutes before uninstalling.

As much as me loving slapping Butts, it doesn't really creates a bondage between me and the game. Takes too much time to progress and there is not so much of a content. Also I can't help but say: the butts turning red the more you slap them is amazing. One of my favorite things in the game as MG. Overall, 6/10 which makes it recommendable.

Its free or at least it was when I got it. But since it was free I thought why not. It made me laugh. Jiggle physics are solid. IDK what else to say its just a why not for a laugh to have it on the list of games you've played if you're friends look.

132 Hours in and I've finally gotten my 10 morbillionth slap. It took me about 6 IRL days straight of autoclicking but that's what it takes to get that 7th achievement.

I started playing for the meme. Sure, It was funny to slap butts and watch it jiggle around, peak comedy honestly. But it wasn't long until I discovered the true essence of this masterpiece. You may think this a simple clicker inventory game like all the rest of them on steam, which I won't lie that it is. But what separates Amarillo's Butt Slapper from the rest of them is the a higher purpose to slapping ass. The Jiggle physics bring happiness and joy to all who witness it. It is simply absolute Cinema.

On a real note, collecting butts and seeing how they each react to a slap still gives me joy playing this game.

Q: Why did I play this on my main?
A: To show the world I am a pro gooner

Q: Will I continue the game in the future?
A: Yes, I want to expand my booty of booty

Q: And finally, was it worth it?
A: Undoubtedly

Ok, a good ol spanking, is a good ol' spanking. 
The clap clap spud is magical, believe me.
I'd be cooked if I were a Gotham Supervillain, first ever to be destroyed by Batman verbally
never gooned harder than I have to Amarillo's Butt Slapper. 10/10 would buy again

So i love BUTT i search for BUTT everyday I Touch my friend's BUTT I bite THEIR BUTT 
okay so This game is fun and simple i like the butt collecting and how sometimes they like BUST YOUR BALLS at the end of the timer to get the butt chest 
That Shit got me on my knees and praying So i can get some @SS
you'll need around 130 hours for the 7/7 achievement but who can say that's a bad thing?
Thank you amarillo for creating this master piece for me to enjoy.

slapping butts is fun :)
also great dev
its what it says on the tin
This game is goofy as 'ell. love it.
I wish i could get a Dainty Wilder butt
Can‚Äôt wait to slap that D fam
i slapped till i couldnt no mo
What you see is what you get.
Well I mean if you like butt's then well you know..

One of my friends who I play with said if I post a review on the game and it gets 350 likes and 350 Awards that she will buy me a new gaming chair to replace my floor mat and a new keyboard to replace my current apple keyboard. So im just gonna leave this here. Please help a brotha out
My doctor recomended this game to stop me from butt slapping in public. Took a while to get all the achievements but you do get an auto slap feature eventually to help out.

Booted up Amarillo‚Äôs Butt Slapper thinking it was a quirky art game or maybe some strange sandbox.

First thing I see: a huge butt. On my screen. Wiggling.

‚ÄúSlap it. Turn it. Slap it again.‚Äù ‚Äî that‚Äôs the tutorial, or life advice, or both. 

So I slapped it. Once. Then again. Then I realized I was just clicking a butt for fun.

The physics are‚Ä¶ something else. It jiggles in ways I didn‚Äôt know butts could jiggle. 

There‚Äôs crates. There‚Äôs inventory. There‚Äôs butts so many butts. I opened one crate, got another butt. It‚Äôs like Pok√©mon‚Äîbut if Pok√©mon only had one species and the species was butt. 


Final verdict:
I came for a weird joke. I stayed for the butt.

with 142 hours on this game and completing it 100%, i can certainly say i am qualified to give my opinions on this game.

everything about this game is a ten out of ten, from the unique butt sound effects for each amazingly beautiful butt, with the countless butts that are available to get in the butt crates i can say that those 142 hours of my life on this magnificent game was worth it, it truly inspired my gooner side and helped me overcome my lack of butt in my day to day life. 

Thank you amarillo for creating this master piece for me to enjoy.

if you appreciate ass and idle games well you found the right game to get.

collect butts and slap to your heart's content.

small bugs here and there but nothing game breaking.

10/10 i love the booty

I would love if female characters would have this type of bounce effects, but in this game are just some butts that have it.
The last achievement does not reset your inventory which is very nice of the programmer to have decided this.
I have gotten my last achievement and not I can unninstall this game.

Amarillo's Butt Slapper Butt it a clicker but instead of click, it slap as you just do is Slap her butt over and over and you can use point to upgrade for two hands and upgrade to slap fast and upgrade to slap more faster so on and so forth dumb and silly

Small idle/clicker game with free loot boxes. 
The art is minimal, and more would be welcome. There are a lot of butts to collect, and it will take you some time to catch them all. You will find them in the loot boxes.

The beginning of the game is slow (there is no auto-clicker). You have to click/slap a humongus amount of times, but once the idle/auto upgrade is complete, you won't have any more upgrades (ironic). It will then become more of a collection game for butts and steam achievements.

Although there is minimal gooning, the game is nice.
As an assman myself, I find this game very satisfying.  Grinding for butts is pretty slow though (pun intended).

Rank: "Good, but..." (yes I know what I could have done there but I chose the high ground :p)

"Amarillos's Butt Slapper" is basically a title for those of us that want a little NFSW flavor in our clicking game. The Good, but... rating is heavily influenced by the fact that this game is free. You can buy packs to give you more content but its not required to enjoy the game. Nothing is pay-walled as of the time of this review.

I enjoyed my time with the game but admittedly only return occasionally when there is a patch of new... content. 

You slap butts. That's it. Its a good time, lol.

The slap sounds are very satisfying, the various backsides you unlock (time released, yes you can just let the game run and unlock gatcha pulls) are varied and even funny (they have some that are wild). I wouldn't pay for this game but you don't have to, and whats here is a fun and sexy distraction or a guilty pleasure achievement hunt if you want a change of pace. Doesn't require any effort at all.

What this game DOES require of you is your time. A lot of it. At least for fellow achievement hunters. You will be slapping the disembodied posterior of various women you unlock (it is just their butt you you unlock, literally an abdomen with the top parts of thighs, still very attractive and appealing despite this) for hours and hours unless you tire of it quickly as I suppose many people have.

As someone who collects trophies, this game will take a long long time 100 percent. If you have some way to cheat a clicking game. Utilize that here and save yourself several months of your life.

I recommend it as a sexy little different experience, you owe it to yourself to download as either a laugh or something to do in-between robust NFSW content, or Triple A gaming. For those who take everything seriously or need most of their content to be engaging and worthwhile... You will be disappointed.

[If you like games like this, consider joining my curator group :)
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/43326716/]

negative.review: It was a pretty good game. Things were going smoothly and I could relax once I bought the auto slapper. Then you had to take that away from me while I was gone...

Its a simple game, and you can unlock upgrades to help progress faster in the game early on, but after about 10min of slapping, you will realise that you have nothing to do, there is no end goal nor any special rewards to keep you motivated. 

The updates you will get stuck on is probably gonna be the (really slow) auto-clicker, and even after using a fast auto clicker myself for 9 hours straight, im not even close to unlocking the last upgrades that would make progress faster. (1 million slaps.)
(All other upgrades were unlocked within the first 20-40 min of gametime while watching youtube videos.)

You cant use the slap-currency in any other way than buying the upgrades i mentioned, and buying backgrounds. Thats it.

5 times a day, you will get random crates, you can sell 10 of them in the lab, or open them, and later on, trade in the new currency for selling your crates to buy seasonal crates. So far, i havent discovered any way to earn more crates. So your collection is gonna take a long time before you get lucky and find something you like.

It was a fun idea at first, but there is no endgame rewards nor any goals, and the animation is the same no matter how many times you slap, so you will get bored real quick after the first few sessions.
I probably wont play this game again, fun idea, but it gets boring after a while.
Honestly the worst clicker I've EVER played. Not being able to slap as fast as I can click is NOT fun.
i like this game. this game would be a lot better if i could be the butt. just an idea. please credit me if you use it.

While this game looks fun and squishy, the game lacks some substance.

The only reason I tried playing this game is because of Achievements. WIthout those, this game would not be played by tons of people.

I give this game a 3/10

Game is alright for a free game, It wasn't anything special. Just another clicker game. The fact there was free loot boxes was nice but overall the game was meh, I can't really complain as it was free though.

3/10

It was a pretty good game. Things were going smoothly and I could relax once I bought the auto slapper. Then you had to take that away from me while I was gone...

Its a simple game, and you can unlock upgrades to help progress faster in the game early on, but after about 10min of slapping, you will realise that you have nothing to do, there is no end goal nor any special rewards to keep you motivated. 

The updates you will get stuck on is probably gonna be the (really slow) auto-clicker, and even after using a fast auto clicker myself for 9 hours straight, im not even close to unlocking the last upgrades that would make progress faster. (1 million slaps.)
(All other upgrades were unlocked within the first 20-40 min of gametime while watching youtube videos.)

You cant use the slap-currency in any other way than buying the upgrades i mentioned, and buying backgrounds. Thats it.

5 times a day, you will get random crates, you can sell 10 of them in the lab, or open them, and later on, trade in the new currency for selling your crates to buy seasonal crates. So far, i havent discovered any way to earn more crates. So your collection is gonna take a long time before you get lucky and find something you like.

It was a fun idea at first, but there is no endgame rewards nor any goals, and the animation is the same no matter how many times you slap, so you will get bored real quick after the first few sessions.
I probably wont play this game again, fun idea, but it gets boring after a while.

Market item generator sloppy toppy game.
There is not even a single full body to slap.
What a JOKE. I can't see a commitment here.
All I see is a business. That is trend chasing slop.

There are two reasons people play this game
1. Item drops: Every day you get five lootboxes with items you can collect or sell on steam market
2. Booty: There's a lot of ass in this game
Neither of these are in my opinion enough to give this game a positive review. Item drops here just kinda suck, all they do is change the design of the butt. In a game like Don't Starve Together items also only serve as skins but there's much more gameplay than just clicking, the drops here weren't made for the game but the game was made for the drops. It also fails as a porn game because there's barely any nudity, some butts have visible vaginas but it's not like you can interact with it or anything and ass without the rest of the body isn't hot at all. The only reason I have so much playtime in this is because I wanted to get every achievement

The only reason I tried playing this game is because of Achievements. WIthout those, this game would not be played by tons of people.

I give this game a 3/10
lacks depth in progression and rewards. after getting auto-click, there's nothing worthwhile to keep the game running and comeback everyday for slow drops.

Game is alright for a free game, It wasn't anything special. Just another clicker game. The fact there was free loot boxes was nice but overall the game was meh, I can't really complain as it was free though.

3/10

This game is Butt Slapper, not Butt Gambler. Unfortunately, this is an ideal product of an average introverted virgin who never touched a butt in their lives and for very obvious reasons:

[list]
    [*]Gambling
    [*]Repetitive/Boring
    [*]Retarded/Tedious (Why?)
    [*]When 'playing', nothing can be bothered to reward you for slapping a molten gummy bear you call a 'human butt'.
    [*]Speaking of a 'human butt', it's more of a gummy bear than jello on how it moves and just as cheap as the reviews satisfied by literally doing nothing. (Go to Deviantart and find yourself some nice and old butt Gifs. You'll see what I mean)
    [*]Nobody knows the meaning of 'a butt' as opposed to 'the butt' so you are pretty much stuck with just one that most virgins drool over; a bunny. Would've made more sense to have different but cannot expect anything beyond a low-end clickbait.
    [*]Leaving or clicking it to farm slaps and crates is not a game but gambling. (Especially without Auto)
[/list]

This game is Butt Slapper, not Butt Gambler. Unfortunately, this is an ideal product of an average introverted virgin who never touched a butt in their lives and for very obvious reasons:

[list]
    [*]Gambling
    [*]Repetitive/Boring
    [*]Retarded/Tedious (Why?)
    [*]When 'playing', nothing can be bothered to reward you for slapping a molten gummy bear you call a 'human butt'.
    [*]Speaking of a 'human butt', it's more of a gummy bear than jello on how it moves and just as cheap as the reviews satisfied by literally doing nothing. (Go to Deviantart and find yourself some nice and old butt Gifs. You'll see what I mean)
    [*]Nobody knows the meaning of 'a butt' as opposed to 'the butt' so you are pretty much stuck with just one that most virgins drool over; a bunny. Would've made more sense to have different but cannot expect anything beyond a low-end clickbait.
    [*]Leaving or clicking it to farm slaps and crates is not a game but gambling. (Especially without Auto)
[/list]

You are far better off starting with all butts and methods of slapping. Fortunately the game is free so even if nobody can read, you are better off [strike] growing balls, getting a job, finding an alive girl [/strike] uninstalling it. Sadly, I doubt any virgin could do that so, my condolences.
